name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft.,  Passive Perception 14

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
